titleStmt.title: Innocency cleared, true worth predicated, against false aspertions: in a letter sent to Mr Henry Burton. From a Christian friend; in defence of Dr Bastwick, one of his quondam fellow sufferers.
titleStmt.author: B. S., fl. 1645.

notesStmt.note: A Christian friend = B.S., who has signed text at foot of page 8.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
